content: 𝐓𝐇𝐈𝐒 𝐈𝐒 𝐈𝐓 🤩  For every role, we’ve found our match And we believe they can hit the Purple Patch! Signed today or retained before,  This is our #𝗖𝗹𝗮𝘀𝘀𝗢𝗳𝟮𝟬𝟮𝟰 #PlayBold #BidForBold #IPLAuction #ನಮ್ಮRCB #IPL2024
Not the result we hoped for, but the journey’s just begun. With many positives to build on, we’ll trust the process and strive to bounce back stronger. 💪🏏  #PlayBold #ನಮ್ಮRCB #IPL2024 #CSKvRCB
First wicket for Green in RCB colours 🥹  How calm was Maxi 😮‍💨
Commentators: RCB have heavily relied only on their top 3.   Rawat & DK took that personally. 🤷‍♂️  #PlayBold #ನಮ್ಮRCB #IPL2024 #CSKvRCB
We fought back and we fought back hard to set a competitive target! 🔥  Over to our bowlers to help us finish on the right side of the ledger 💪  #PlayBold #ನಮ್ಮRCB #IPL2024 #CSKvRCB
